Desktop Repair

Repair Request
We take your privacy extremely seriously, and we will never share or sell your personal information.
Screen Replacement

Accidents are part of life. If your screen is cracked or broken, we will replace it quickly and with no trouble.

Hard Drive Replacement

Moving parts are subject to wearing out. If your device is having hard drive trouble, we can make a quick replacement.

CD-ROM Replacement

Is your MacBook not recognizing discs? Failing to burn? We will replace your CD drive easily, restoring your laptop to full functionality.

Virus Removal

Even the most careful person can accidentally access a virus. We will have your laptop back up and running in no time, virus-free.

Data Backup

Is your data secure? We will set up an easy to use backing up solution for your device.

Device Diagnostic

Let us give your laptop a full health check. Our tests will show up any faults and then… we fix them.

In-store Computer or Mac Repair Services

Contemporary times are the perfect example of humans using electronics to their fullest potential. But on one hand where this use provides a lot of ease and comfort to the user, on the other hand the malfunctioning of these devices turn out to be a crucial issue. In such cases when the devices stop working properly there is an urgent need of identifying the issue and getting it repaired. A desktop is one such gadget which serves a lot of purposes for the working class, students, freelancers, shop owners and nearly every person who is somewhere or the other in need of advanced technology for their work and management.

As important as it is to get your desktop repaired, it is also essential that you ensure the expertise of an experienced and trusted firm. Gadget Medics is one such option which will rescue you from the dilemma of a damaged laptop and provide the correct remedies for the same in Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach and Delray Beach Florida Location.

Out of the numerous odds that your desktop can face, here are a few of the very prominent issues that occur in a desktop –

  • Screen damage – a desktop screen is one of the most delicate parts of its entire mechanism and being fragile it is also the most frequently harmed element. From display malfunctioning to cracked or broken screens, we at Gadget Medics will transform it back to its fresh version.
  • Hard drive substitution – hard drives are parts that remain in constant motion and due to this constant moving they tend to get damaged soon. In case if your device is facing the same issue, at Gadget Medics we provide quick and easy replacement for you’re worn out hard drive and give your system a better working experience.
  • Virus cleansing – with the plethora of sites that you access online and the exterior devices that you connect for data transfer in your desktop you often open a potential gateway for viruses to seek shelter in your system. These viruses may be of multiple types and would cause harm to your files and data at multiple levels. Just like a good pest control we provide a quick, easy and safe virus cleansing service to ensure that your device is safe and free from any malware.
  • Backup Data – it often occurs that due to any harmful entity or mistakenly your device might get formatted or particular important information might get lost. In order to prevent such situations we back up your system data and ensure its security.

There are many more services and issues that can be treated by us at Gadget Medics with guaranteed efficiency and assured results. We make sure that your desktop works as per your will and in case of any damage we are their to have your back.
